<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Schooled in Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2148) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You notice the signs and symbols that members of mystery cults and other secret societies use to declare their affiliation to fellow members. You can use [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) in place of [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) about such groups. If you belong to a secret cult, lodge, sect, or similar organization, you automatically recognize members of your group unless they are specifically attempting to conceal their presence from you.
name: Schooled in Secrets
